name: that time i got reincarnated as a dice
name_original: that time i got reincarnated as a dice
description:
Our main goal was testing out our custom C engine and make something out of the box. We did not use a pre existing engine for this game.  In that sense, the jam was very helpful in detecting our engine flaws and ergonomics. 

We did not finish all the way, but if you decide to test it out and jump around, please let us know if the engine crashes in unusual ways or not ;).

Our intention was to make a game where you (the player) are a dice and get attacked by slimes. You have to land on a side and the side pointing up is the amount of damage you deal. The core idea is in, it just feels and looks a bit iffy ;) landing on a side is hard and doesnt feel right yet, but hey, we had fun!

Controls:

  • G: Increase gravity (resets when you jump)
  • Space: Jump forwards (towards camera direction)
  • WASD: move camera
  • Arrow keys: Spin around! (adds spin to the player)

Thanks!

Game and Engine made by Helldembez & Eksit
